amendatorysection.catchline: Hearing; requested within thirty days; effect.
amendatorysection.para: If a hearing is requested under sections 79-268 and 79-269 more than five school days but not more than thirty calendar days following the actual receipt of written notice, the hearing examiner shall be appointed and the hearing held pursuant to the requirements of section 79-269 but the imposed punishment shall continue in effect pending final determination.
